text: Acropyrgota is a genus of flies in the family Pyrgotidae. == Species == *A. cribripennis Bezzi, 1929 (Synonym of Cardiacera cribripennis (Bezzi, 1929)) *A. flavescens Hendel, 1914 == References == Category:Pyrgotidae Category:Diptera of Australasia Category:Brachycera genera Category:Taxa named by Friedrich Georg Hendel
title: Acropyrgota
